import "./AddPet.style.css" import { useState } from "react" import axios from "axios" const AddPet = (props) => { const [data, setData] = useState({}) const handleChange = (event) => { setData({ ...data, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); props.createPet(data) console.log(data) setData({}) } return
